abstract: Bishop Manning makes Scandinavian relief appeal, N Y C
snippet: A plea for "all the help we can give to the peace-loving people of the Scandinavian countries" was made last night by Bishop William T. Manning at a religious mass meeting for Scandinavian relief held at the Cathedral of St. John the Divine....

headline.main: MANNING MAKES PLEA FOR SCANDINAVIAN AID; Meeting Held in Cathedral for Victims of Aggression

lead_paragraph: A plea for "all the help we can give to the peace-loving people of the Scandinavian countries" was made last night by Bishop William T. Manning at a religious mass meeting for Scandinavian relief held at the Cathedral of St. John the Divine.
